metadata.title: CVE-2021-34081 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: OS Command Injection vulnerability in bbultman gitsome through 0.2.3 allowsattackers to execute arbitrary commands via a crafted tag name of thetarget git repository.

criterions.comment: gitsome: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
